# Git and GitHub

![](images/github.png){fig-align="center" width="719"}

-   git: is a version-control software; it track changes in files.

-   GitHub: is a online git platform that allows people to collaborate easily on a project.

    -   backs your git projects online

    -   provides user friendly UI to interact with git.
